original: Puna caparaṁ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā …pe…
analyzed: puna caparam khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro sammappadhānāḥ bhāvitāḥ honti su bhāvitāḥ pe
cattāraḥ iddhipādāḥ bhāvitāḥ honti su bhāvitā
pañca indriyāni bhāvitāni honti su bhāvitāni
pañca balāni bhāvitāni honti su bhāvitāni
satta bojjhaṅgāḥ bhāvitāḥ honti su bhāvitāḥ pe

original: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito.
analyzed: ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ bhāvitaḥ hoti su bhāvito

original: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito, idampi khīṇāsavassa
analyzed: yat api khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ bhāvitaḥ hoti su bhāvitaḥ idam api khīṇāsavassa

original: bhikkhuno balaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhuno balam hoti yam balam āgamma khīṇa asavaḥ bhikkhu āsavānam khayam paṭijānāti khīṇā me āsavā ati
imāni dasa khīṇāsava balāni
katamāni dasaḥ iddhi balāni

original: Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānāḥ iddhi vikubbanāḥ iddhi manas mayāḥ iddhi ñāṇa vipphārāḥ iddhi samādhi vipphārāḥ

original: iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha
analyzed: iddhi ariyāḥ iddhi kamma vipāka jāḥ iddhi puññavataḥ iddhi vijjā āmayāḥ iddhi tattha
tattha sammā payoga paccayāḥ
imāni dasaḥ iddhi balāni
katamāni dasa tathāgata balāni

original: Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: idha tathāgataḥ ṭhānam ca ṭhānataḥ aṭṭhānam ca aṭṭhānataḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi
analyzed: yat pi tathāgataḥ ṭhānam ca ṭhānataḥ aṭṭhānam ca aṭṭhānataḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi

original: tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti
analyzed: tathāgatassa tathāgata balam hoti yam balam āgamma tathāgataḥ āsabham ṭhānam paṭijānāti
parisāsu sīha nādam nadati brahma cakkam pavatta iti

original: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: puna ca param tathāgataḥ atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipākam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ
analyzed: yam pi tathāgataḥ atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipāka

original: yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato
analyzed: yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi tathāgatassa tathāgata balam hoti yam balam āgamma tathāgataḥ

original: āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṁ, nadati, brahmacakkaṁ pavatteti.
analyzed: āsabham ṭhānam paṭijānāti parisāsu sīhanāda nadati brahmacakkam pavatta iti

original: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: puna ca param tathāgataḥ sabbattha gāminim paṭipadam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa
analyzed: yam pi tathāgataḥ sabbattha gāminim paṭipadam yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi tathāgatassa

original: tathāgatabalaṁ hoti, yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti, parisāsu
analyzed: tathāgata balam hoti yam balam āgamma tathāgataḥ āsabham ṭhānam paṭijānāti parisāsu
sīha nādam nadati brahma cakkam pavatta iti

original: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato anekadhātuṁ nānādhātuṁ lokaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: punar ca param tathāgataḥ aneka dhātum nānā dhātum lokam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato anekadhātuṁ nānādhātuṁ lokaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe….
analyzed: yam pi tathāgataḥ aneka dhātum nānā dhātum lokam yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi tathāgatassa pe

original: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato sattānaṁ nānādhimuttikataṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: punar ca param tathāgataḥ sattānam nānā adhimutti katam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato sattānaṁ nānādhimuttikataṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe….
analyzed: yam pi tathāgataḥ sattānam nānā adhimuttikatam yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi tathāgatassa pe

original: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ indriyaparopariyattaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: puna ca param tathāgataḥ para sattānam para puggalānam indriya para upariyattam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ indriyaparopariyattaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe….
analyzed: yam pi tathāgataḥ para sattānam para puggalānam indriya para upariyattam yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi tathāgatassa pe

original: Puna caparaṁ tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: puna ca param tathāgataḥ jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam saṅkilesam vodānam vuṭṭhānam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampi tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe….
analyzed: yam pi tathāgataḥ jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam saṅkilesam vodānam vuṭṭhānam yathābhūtam pajānāti idam pi tathāgatassa pe
